Author: Current_Selection
Text: I know! One treatment center I was at refused to let people be vegetarian (most do however) so I ended up drinking A LOT of ensure plus instead of getting violently ill from eating meat.

Author: velvetviolets_
Text: > "you can't be vegetarian/vegan and recovered"  ugh this so much. my morals have zero intersection with my ED and I haven’t eaten meat since I was a literal child, I don’t feel restrictive at all with those things out of my diet, it’s just natural
